title: Bankers Due to Deliver Crucial Aramco Valuation as Soon as Friday
text:
Saudi Arabian Oil Co.’s investment bankers could deliver, as soon as Friday, their final recommendations on the valuation of the state-owned energy giant in an initial public offering, with the headline number expected to fall well short of the $2 trillion targeted by Saudi Arabia’s Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, according to people familiar with the matter.

The crown prince has indicated he wants the IPO to value Saudi Arabian Oil, or Aramco, at $2 trillion. But that target has already met some resistance from company...
description: Saudi Arabian Oil Co.’s investment bankers could deliver as soon as Friday a recommended valuation of the state-owned energy giant’s IPO below the $2 trillion targeted by Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
